title: Improving Instructional Design Models for Enhancing Modern Societal Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Social sector job competency enhancement course for large-scale non-degree adult learners in mobile learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: They can analyze structural limitations of existing instructional design models and derive at least three improvement strategies.
They can design an instructional design framework reflecting changing learning environments and technology trends.
They can propose a content development process for social job training optimized for microlearning environments.
They can specify improvement plans for instructional design models utilizing formative assessment data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
